title: PBE - Can`t log into my PBE account?!?!
body:
Hi guys,
I have a problem with my PBE account and i don´t know if it´s some kind of a bug or something...
So before a week I made me PBE account  and connected it with my normal LoL account as well but when I tryed to log in it says that my Username or Password aren´t correct all over and over....
Does anyone have the same problem like me or does anyone know´s the solution?

Thanks!

replies.body: You're most likely getting that error because your PBE username is different from your EUNE username. Double check that you're using the right username/password for your PBE account since those *can* be different from your live account. Feel free to hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you can't remember!
